Row.Text: I was born on the prairies where the wind blew free and there was nothing to break the light of the sun. Welcome to the lands of the Apache as I am their chief Geronimo.
Once I moved about like the wind. Now I surrender to you and that is all.
As you have resolved this kindness to me you are worthy of my trust. Now come and let nature hear our callings of union and strength.
Why must you come with treachery and malicious intent? Be careful as you may suffer the same fate as the White Man or the Mexican that came before.
Our people will no longer face persecution. After your demise the bodies of those we have killed will no longer be worth counting for.
We must encourage exchange between our people. Would this be of interest?

We have reasons to suspect that you have talked about our affairs to those who wish to be rid of us. No longer may your word have ground on this soil.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
In a time of persecution and danger of my peoples I deem you worthy of trust. An alliance would be best for our peoples.
